Name: Shrine of Azshara
Description: Trains Naga Sirens and Couatl. Also contains spell upgrades for Naga Sirens.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Orders units that pop out of the building to immediately attack move to the targeted area. You can rally point gold mines or trees to auto-harvest. You can rally point a unit to have new units follow it when they finish building.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip:
Powerful spellcaster. Can initially cast Parasite, which damages an enemy unit over time and can spawn a Watery Minion from their corpse. Can also learn Frost Armor, and Cyclone.

Attacks land and air units.
Root.Name: Train Naga Siren

Root.Tooltip:
Light flying unit that can learn Abolish Magic.

Attacks land and air units.
Root.Name: Train Couatl

Root.Tooltip: Increases Naga Sirens' mana capacity, mana regeneration rate, hit points, and gives them the ability to cast Frost Armor.
Root.Name: Research Naga Siren Adept Training

Root.Tooltip: Increases Naga Sirens' mana capacity, mana regeneration rate, hit points, and gives them the ability to cast Cyclone.
Root.Name: Research Naga Siren Master Training

Root.Tooltip:
Gives the Couatl the ability to dispel positive buffs from enemy units, and negative buffs from friendly units.
Damages summoned units.
Root.Name: Research Abolish Magic
